did.head: Descriptive Summary

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Eta Sigma Phi. Beta Rho Chapter (Duke University).

did.unittitle: Eta Sigma Phi, Beta Rho Chapter (Duke University) records 1942-1967
did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult the Library's online catalog.
did.abstract: Eta Sigma Phi is the national honorary collegiate society for students of Classical Studies.
The collection includes financial records, correspondence, membership lists, ritual documents, constitution, and printed matter. The material ranges in date from 1942-1967.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: Copyright for Official University records is held by Duke University; all other copyright is retained by the authors of items in these papers, or their descendants, as stipulated by United States copyright law.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Eta Sigma Phi, Beta Rho Chapter (Duke University) Records, Duke University Archives, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The Eta Sigma Phi, Beta Rho Chapter (Duke University) Records were received by the University Archives as a transfer in 1980.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accession A80-213 is described in this finding aid.
Descriptive sources and standards used to create this inventory: DACS, EAD, NCEAD guidelines, and our local Style Guide.
This finding aid is NCEAD compliant.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The purpose of Eta Sigma Phi is to further the spirit of cooperation and goodwill among members of classical departments, to stimulate interest in the study of the classics, and to increase one's knowledge of the art and literature of ancient Greece and Rome. The Beta Rho Chapter was established at Duke around 1942.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: The collection includes financial records, correspondence, membership lists, ritual documents, constitution, and printed matter. The material ranges in date from 1942-1967.

controlaccess.head: Subject Headings
controlaccess.p: These are searchable subject entries for this collection. Performing a search on these subjects in the Duke University Libraries online catalog will bring up other related research materials.
